activities: Greenphire is a leading provider of payment services to reimburse participants in clinical research trials, and payments to investigational sites and other affiliated service providers supporting clinical research.  In the course of providing these services, Greenphire will receive personal information related to clinical research subjects, patients, investigators, site staff, healthcare providers, industry experts and employees of organizations involved in the conduct or supervision of clinical research trials.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: clinical trial data, patient, customer, supplied in electronic formats
recoursemech: Greenphire has contracted with the American Arbitration Association (AAA) International Centre for Dispute Resolution (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) to address any claims and resolve disputes.
